Interface_name: Basic HTTP server using net/http with HandleFunc and ListenAndServe
Instruction:
Task Description: Create a Go HTTP server that implements WebDAV functionality with custom logging and special handling for specific HTTP headers.

Struct Description: The webdav.Handler struct provides WebDAV server functionality with in-memory storage for files and locks. We'll wrap this with custom request handling.

Fields:
- FileSystem: webdav.FileSystem - In-memory filesystem implementation
- LockSystem: webdav.LockSystem - In-memory lock system implementation
- Logger: func(*http.Request, error) - Custom logging function for request tracking

Methods:
- ServeHTTP: (http.ResponseWriter, *http.Request) -> () - Main handler method that processes HTTP requests
- NewMemFS: () -> webdav.FileSystem - Creates new in-memory filesystem
- NewMemLS: () -> webdav.LockSystem - Creates new in-memory lock system

Additional Functions:
- main: () -> () - Entry point that sets up the server and routes
- requestHandler: (http.ResponseWriter, *http.Request) -> () - Custom middleware for special header handling
